name: taskqueue_list_projects
description: List all projects in the system and their basic information (ID, initial prompt, task counts), optionally filtered by state (open, pending_approval, completed, all).

state.description: Filter projects by state. 'open' (any incomplete task), 'pending_approval' (any tasks awaiting approval), 'completed' (all tasks done and approved), or 'all' to skip filtering.

name: taskqueue_read_project
description: Read all information for a given project, by its ID, including its tasks' statuses.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to read (e.g., proj-1).

name: taskqueue_create_project
description: Create a new project with an initial prompt and a list of tasks. This is typically the first step in any workflow.

initialPrompt.description: The initial prompt or goal for the project.

projectPlan.description: A more detailed plan for the project. If not provided, the initial prompt will be used.

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

toolRecommendations.description: Recommendations for tools to use to complete the task.

ruleRecommendations.description: Recommendations for relevant rules to review when completing the task.

autoApprove.description: If true, tasks will be automatically approved when marked as done. If false or not provided, tasks require manual approval.

name: taskqueue_delete_project
description: Delete a project and all its associated tasks.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to delete (e.g., proj-1).

name: taskqueue_add_tasks_to_project
description: Add new tasks to an existing project.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to add tasks to (e.g., proj-1).

tasks.description: An array of task objects to add.

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

toolRecommendations.description: Recommendations for tools to use to complete the task.

ruleRecommendations.description: Recommendations for relevant rules to review when completing the task.

name: taskqueue_finalize_project
description: Mark a project as complete. Can only be called when all tasks are both done and approved. This is typically the last step in a project workflow.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to finalize (e.g., proj-1).

name: taskqueue_generate_project_plan
description: Use an LLM to generate a project plan and tasks from a prompt. The LLM will analyze the prompt and any attached files to create a structured project plan.

prompt.description: The prompt text or file path to use for generating the project plan.

provider.description: The LLM provider to use (requires corresponding API key to be set).

model.description: The specific model to use (e.g., 'gpt-4-turbo' for OpenAI).

attachments.description: Optional array of paths to files to attach as context. There is no need to read the files before calling this tool!

name: taskqueue_list_tasks
description: List all tasks, optionally filtered by project ID and/or state (open, pending_approval, completed, all). Tasks may include tool and rule recommendations to guide their completion.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to list tasks from. If omitted, list all tasks.

state.description: Filter tasks by state. 'open' (not started/in progress), 'pending_approval', 'completed', or 'all' to skip filtering.

name: taskqueue_read_task
description: Get details of a specific task by its ID. The task may include toolRecommendations and ruleRecommendations fields that should be used to guide task completion.

projectId.description: The ID of the project containing the task (e.g., proj-1).

taskId.description: The ID of the task to read (e.g., task-1).

name: taskqueue_create_task
description: Create a new task within an existing project. You can optionally include tool and rule recommendations to guide task completion.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to add the task to (e.g., proj-1).

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

toolRecommendations.description: Recommendations for tools to use to complete the task.

ruleRecommendations.description: Recommendations for relevant rules to review when completing the task.

name: taskqueue_update_task
description: Modify a task's properties. Note: (1) completedDetails are required when setting status to 'done', (2) approved tasks cannot be modified, (3) status must follow valid transitions: not started → in progress → done. You can also update tool and rule recommendations to guide task completion.

projectId.description: The ID of the project containing the task (e.g., proj-1).

taskId.description: The ID of the task to update (e.g., task-1).

title.description: The new title for the task (optional).

description.description: The new description for the task (optional).

status.description: The new status for the task (optional).

completedDetails.description: Details about the task completion (required if status is set to 'done').

toolRecommendations.description: Recommendations for tools to use to complete the task.

ruleRecommendations.description: Recommendations for relevant rules to review when completing the task.

name: taskqueue_delete_task
description: Remove a task from a project.

projectId.description: The ID of the project containing the task (e.g., proj-1).

taskId.description: The ID of the task to delete (e.g., task-1).

name: taskqueue_approve_task
description: Approve a completed task. Tasks must be marked as 'done' with completedDetails before approval. Note: This is a CLI-only operation that requires human intervention.

projectId.description: The ID of the project containing the task (e.g., proj-1).

taskId.description: The ID of the task to approve (e.g., task-1).

name: taskqueue_get_next_task
description: Get the next task to be done in a project. Returns the first non-approved task in sequence, regardless of status. The task may include toolRecommendations and ruleRecommendations fields that should be used to guide task completion.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to get the next task from (e.g., proj-1).
